title: I'm about to buy a Pixel 4 from someone. The person bought it in Jun. Could I use the warrant if nee
content:
I'm about to buy a Pixel 4 from someone. The person bought it in Jun. Could I use the warrant if needed? 
I used to have Pixels phone since Pixel 2, and I had to use the warrant a few times, so I am worried if I would be able to use the warrant.
